text:
<You awake from your slumber. You try to recall why you are on this stone platform with etched in symbols, but you cant remember anything. You then here a mysterious elderly voice.>
Mysterious Voice: You have finally awaken
Mysterious Voice: That doesnt matter....yet. I just hope the GrandMaster was right about you

Please just open the chest.
 <A chest appears in front of you>

choices.text: (Refuse)'Not until you tell me my I'm here and who you are!'

text:
<In the chest you see 3 items: A sword, a bow, and a orb>
 Mysterious Voice: We..Or I should say you don't have all day. Choooosseeee Yoooouuuuurrr Weeeeaaappppooonn!
Mysterious Voice: Ha! Well, looks like we are at a standstill. I'd just open the chest if I were you...
Mysterious Voice: Basic, yet effective...

Mysterious Voice: I hope you know how to use that!
 <Mysterious Voice Laughs>
Mysterious Voice: Ha! Do you even know what that is?!

Mysterious Voice: Looks like you are going to have to use it!
 <A bandit charges you!>
You attack the bandit with you weapon - knocking him back
The bandit gets back up and swings his blade and misses!
Mysterious Voice: Hmmm, the GrandMaster may have picked the right one after all...(Your strike defeats the bandit - You gain 15 experience Points!)
Mysterious Voice: There might be some hope for you yet

choices.text: What are you talking about?! That guy almost killed me!
Wait until I find you.....you are next

text: Mysterious Voice: Oh, dont be so dramatic! That was your first test. Now you see that building near the mountains? Go there for your second trial (You see a stone building in the distance. Two paths lead to it: Forest Path and Lake Path)

Mysterious Voice: Ha! I doubt it!
(You feel an agonizing pain in your head.
You take 5 damage!)
Mysterious Voice: Lets try that again..

(You walk towards the forest and you hear screaming in the distance and head towards the sound - farther into the forest)
(You stumble upon a traveler stuck under a huge boulder)
Traveler:Please help me!

(You push against the boulder, helping the traveler out from under it.
The effort causes you to smash your hand>
(You take 5 Damage)
Traveler: Thank you so much! Please take this
(You receive 2 Potions and a weapon upgrade!)
(The traveler walks away, grateful)

(You watch the traveler struggle under the boulder and take the backpack next to him
 (You receive a potion and a big weapon upgrade!!)

(You descend farther ino the woods. You spot a lion walking towards you. The lion shifts into a man with tribal tattoos all over his body) Druid: Hello, human. I am a druid, a protector of the woods and all life that inhabit it.
Druid: You have shown no regard for human life! You must pay!
(Druid charges you!)
Whats your move?

choices.text: Apologize to the druid for your bad act

text: (You sprint away from the charging Druid. Somehow you found a way to find form the shapeshifter)
Druid: Because I, myself, am a protector of these woods I shall spare your life...but dont think you'll get off easy. (Druid smashes your arm with a rock. You take 10 points of damage)
(After a while of walking through the forest you see another lion. The lion seems to be wounded)

(You give the lion a little bit of one of your potions. The lion transforms into a human) Druid: Thank you, adventurer! Here are some items for my gratitude.(You receive a Potion, Mana Potion!)(The Druid tranforms into a bird and flies away)
(You strike the lion and put it out of it's misery. The lion transforms into a druid. You recieve a Potion, Mana Potion, and a Weapon Upgrade!

(You cast your healing spell on the lion. The lions wounds disappear and the lion transforms into a human) Druid: Thank you adventurer! Where did you learn the spell? Only the druids know that! Nonetheless take this scroll. This will improve your healing. (You receive another scroll and learned Druid Healing)
(You walk towards the lake. You hear someone crying for help. You stumble upon a fisherman getting robbed by a bandit.) Fisherman: Please help me!
(You come to the aid of the fisherman. The bandit charges you!)
(You decide to help the bandit and you both rob the fisherman and split his belongings. You recieve a mana potion and a weapon upgrade! You turn around and the bandit charges you.)

(You continue down the lake path and a hooded mystical man approaches you.) Mage: Hmmm...I sense a great power within you, adventurer. One you have not the littlest clue about. If you answer this correctly you will be worthy of this scroll: Does pineapple belong on pizza?

choices.text: Its up to whom eats the pizza

text: The bandit takes out a bow and pull back in arrow - aimed right at you

choices.text: Pick up fishermans shield to block

text: Mage: That is incorrect! (The mage hurls a waterblast towards you and launches you into the lake.You take 5 damage) Mage:Eh, because you seen the spell already...here you go. (You have received a Water Blast scroll! The mage fades into the distance)
Mage: Please, traveler. This is a simple yes or no question....
Mage: That is correct! Here is the water spell scroll and a mana potion for your troubles. (You have received a Water Blast scroll and a Mana Potion!)
You runaway from the bandit - in a coward like fashion - and get grazed by the arrow dealing 10 points of damage to you.
You pickup the Fishermans shield - blocking the bandits arrow and then charging him into the lake! (You gain 15 experience)

<You are almost at the end of the lake path. The area around you starts to get misty and you hear an eerie voice closing in on you.) Ghost Fisherman: Hello adventurer...although the wounds I suffered eventually took my life I am greatful for you aid. Please take this weapon as a token of my gratitude...it was my great grandfathers.(You receive the Dragon Blade!!! Receiving the Great Dragon Blade makes you drop your whole inventory to make room)
You attack the bandit with you weapon - knocking him back
You attack the bandit with you weapon - knocking him back

(You exit towards the stone building. A man in a dark robe approaches.) Dark Wizard: Talk around the mage guilds is that the Grand Master has a new chosen one. The word also says that person may be you. It is quite odd though...I see nothing but disappointment. Test your magicks mortal (The Dark Mage begins casting a spell.)

choices.text: Attack Dark Wizard with the Dragon Blade

text: (You attack the Dark Wizard...foolishly with the weapon you got from the beginning of the game..... you take a lot of damage)
Lets just pretend you didnt want to runaway from the final battle...of the game

(The Dark Wizard falls to the ground and you  received 1000 experience points! Dark Wizard: Heh, you really may be the Grand Masters chosen one. You are all still doomed and not ready for whats coming..(The Dark Wizard is severely weakened)
You again try to attack the Wizard with the basic weapon given to you...You take a lot of damage...actually you know what...you die.. GAME OVER!
(You launch a fireball into the Dark Wizards face, turning his whole body to ash. You laugh and then walk towards the stone building...)
(You walk away from the Wizard, sparing his life and continue towards the stone building)
Awww...Look at you - You are so nice! THANK YOU FOR WATCHING ME PLAY THE DEMO VERSION OF THIS GAME! Feel free to play again
Well that was dark...ummmm...THANK YOU FOR WATCHING ME PLAY THE DEMO VERSION OF THIS GAME! Feel Free to play again..but maybe we can make better decisions this time
